Maven SVN Revision Number Plugin

This plugin retrieves the revision number and the status of the Subversion working copy directory.

The SVNKit library is used for all Subversion-related operations.

Goals Overview

  • svn-revision-number-maven-plugin:release Retrieves the status and revision number of a file or a directory under Subversion version control.

Using the plugin

General instructions on how to use the Maven SVN Revision Number Plugin can be found on the usage page. Some more specific use cases are described in the examples given below.

If you feel like the plugin is missing a feature or has a defect, you can fill a feature request or bug report in our issue tracker. When creating a new issue, please provide a comprehensive description of your concern.

Examples

The following examples show how to use the Maven SVN Revision Number Plugin in more advanced usecases:

  • Storing output properties in the resource file
  • Adding the revision number to the project artifact name
